metadata.title: CVE-2012-0881 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description: Apache Xerces2 Java Parser before 2.12.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU consumption) via a crafted message to an XML service, which triggers hash table collisions.

criterions.comment: libxerces2-java package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
